text: Tupo Fa'amasino (born April 13, 1966 in Apia) is a former Samoan rugby union player. He played as a centre. ==Career== His first match with Samoa was in the match against Wales at Cardiff, on November 12, 1988, during the 1988 Western Samoa tour in Wales. He was part of the 1991 and 1995 World Cups. He also played for Japan twice in the 1993 Japan tour in Argentina and Wales, in the match against Wales on October 16, 1993. His last international match for Samoa was in a test match against Fiji at Suva, on July 20, 1996. ==References== ==External links== * *Tupo Fa'amasino at New Zealand Rugby History Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Apia Category:Samoan rugby union players Category:Samoan expatriates in Japan Category:Rugby union centres Category:Samoa international rugby union players Category:Japan international rugby union players Category:Wellington rugby union players Category:Hurricanes (rugby union) players
title: Tupo Fa'amasino
